title: (7580) Alcácer do Sal - 1296 N120
description: Parking on concrete floor, level, next to the restaurant and parking in which they have forbidden to park the campers. Same as next to the information desk, public toilets and access to the village, which is really nice and original and well worth a visit. Stuck on the road and so noisy, and surrounded by thousands of mosquitoes. ID provided with repellent!

title: (7580) Alcácer do Sal - 1296 N120
description: Free parking! Great location. You are right on the river (not for swimming). Clean restroom on site. Large playground right next door. You can walk to a castle (uphill). There are restaurants, pharmacies, shops etc. nearby. The city is nicely lit up in the evenings.

title: (7580-520) Alcácer do Sal - N120
description: Romantic place near the restaurant on the shore, great in the evening for sunset and when the city starts to light up! Great sound ambience and very quiet :)

name: Pacha Mama Community
title: (7580-305) Pacha Mama Community
description:
We are the PachaMama community and we would love to welcome you to our cozy little farm. 
We have everything you need including toilets, hot showers, wifi, chill-out zone with games, and a fully equipped kitchen. 

On Saturdays, we host an all-you-can-eat Pizza Party and you are very welcome to join!


There are a lot of animals and dogs on the farm and you are welcome to bring your own pet. 
We have a canal that runs through our 
property where you can cool off in the fresh water in the summer time. We also have a yoga dome with daily yoga classes.

There are two ways to reach us; either from the main road, or the other road crossing the small village of Bairro da 
Quintinha. NEVER take the road that crosses the village, it is very sandy and there is a great risk of getting stuck! Instead, turn right off the main road just before IC1. 

We look forward to welcoming you! :))

title: (7580) Alcácer do Sal - Rua do Independente Futebol Clube Alcacerense
title_short: (7580) Alcácer do Sal - Rua do Independente Futebol Clube Alcacerense
description: Parking authorized 24h. Very, very quiet, no wild animals, no dogs, no traffic, no young people talking ... Absolute calm. If the laundry ends late Intermarché, just make 70 m to spend a dream night. Even without laundry, it works too.

address.street: Rua do Independente Futebol Clube Alcacerense

name: Camping of Alcacer do Sal
title: (7580) Camping of Alcacer do Sal
description: Small municipal campsite, very nice, inexpensive, the campsite is quiet, intermarché 50m away with CC station, lidl nearby, restaurant close to the campsite, swimming pool close to the campsite for 2nd and free for children. small downside: mosquitoes, and flies in the evening it is almost impossible to eat outside.

address.street: 4 Rua do Independente Futebol Clube Alcacerense

title: (7580) Monte Novo - Unnamed Road

title: (7580) Santa Susana - Unnamed Road

We had a good night there!

Very quiet space, you can spend the night at the water's edge, on weekends with more movement with water sports, ideal for relaxing and plenty of space for picnics. Great for kids to play and ride a bike.

title: (7050) São Cristóvão - 38.490760, -8.315793
description:
Countryside small farm, family friendly and very cosy. Safe and quiet.
The owners are young farmers who are also campers. 
Drinkable water is available. Wastewater and black water drainage available. 
4G internet coverage
The farm is very close to the picturesque village of São Cristóvão where you can take advantage of the local gastronomy, secular church and hiking grounds.
Situated halfway between Montemor o Novo and Alcácer do Sal taking the road N253.

title: (7580) Comporta - Unnamed Road
description: Area of interest that is worth seeing

description: Small square clay near quiet subdivision 3 places about no service but quiet for one night

title: (7570-177) Grândola - 18 Rua Doutor Jacinto Nunes
description: Self-service laundromat with three washing and drying machines each, change machine, television, seating, WiFi and sockets. Open 2a a domingo 07:00 a.m. - 11:00 p.m. Parking is possible at the park around the corner. Another salon one street further.

title: (7570-239) Grândola - 12 Avenida António Inácio da Cruz
title_short: (7570-239) Grândola - 12 Avenida António Inácio da Cruz
description: Parking on the streets next to the park. Public toilets open from 08:00-20:00 in the park close to the fountain. Slept one night felt safe. Police passed several times without saying anything. But we kept our door shut to not disturb anyone.

title: (7570) Grândola - A. do Sul
description: Rest area on A2 motorway. Standard parking, gas station and restaurant. Good to have a rest during the trip.

title: (7570) Grândola - 45 Rua Maria Espada Feio Beatriz
title_short: (7570) Grândola - 45 Rua Maria Espada Feio Beatriz
description:
Picnic tables and barbecue available, next to a tiny stream.
Workout equipment present. Fig tree.
The municipality is working on installing toilets to turn the area into an eco spot. It is legal to park here overnight.
Good for a snack stop but close to the road, noisy to spend the night.

title: (7595) Torrão - N5
description: Very quiet, panoramic view of the dam. Version 1 right before the bridge, 2 to 3 camping car with air. Before the bridge to the left 1, and after the bridge to doubt 2 see 3. Be careful left after the bridge c forbidden. Property of the state. Narrow road for the PL

title: (4970-500) Torrão -
description: Nice and quiet place right behind the damm. No services at all but flat and with shade. Way to the water is steep but possible. You can walk with your dog for hours without meeting anyone.

title: (7570) Grândola - Unnamed Road

title: (7580) Comporta - 49 Rua das Oliveiras

description:
Hardware store where you can buy
 gas bottle 907 (the blue one) among many other things. One of the few in the area.
Very good deal.

title: (7570) Carvalhal - Rua Da Faina
description: Free parking for an estimated 6 campers. We stood there for two nights with no problems. 5 minutes walk to Praia do Carvalhal (no mobile homes are allowed in the beach car park, not even during the day). There is a small restaurant opposite. We didn't eat there, but were allowed to use the toilet. There is also a small surf shop. A very nice place with lots of stork nests and a beautiful sunset :)

title: (7580) Comporta - 4 Rua das Salinas
description: Great parking lot in a nice little village. 5 minutes by car to the beach. In the town there are many bars and restaurants which are all great and the prices are completely ok (not overrun with tourists). Parked our van here and had a great evening and slept very well afterwards.

title: (7580) Comporta - 31 Rua 25 de Abril
description: Ample parking area with shade at the ends. The beautiful beach of Comporta is 10 minutes by bike, 25 minutes on foot. Potable water, sewage, emptying cassette available free of charge. Very quiet day and night, it is close to the GNR.

title: (7580-649) Comporta - 6 Rua de São Pedro
description: Ample parking for AC at the back of town next to the sports center. Quiet and shaded in the afternoon.

title: () Torrão -
description:
This is a Quinta directly at the lake owned by a family. Warm shower, toilets and a chill area directly at the lake. Enjoy pure nature and observe the wildlife around the lake.
You can come with your caravan or tent. €12.- per van/tent. €3 per extra person/pet.
Contact them before you arrive and make sure they are around.

title: (7595) Torrão - Rua de Santa Maria
description: Beautiful place, close to the water and with a view for the "Montado" (hill with oak trees). Perfect to spend the night and some time.

title: (7595) Torrão - N2
description: Pleasant place to spend the night. Near the village, earth access but in good condition, on the edge of an old quarry and near the river.

title: (7080) Vendas Novas - A6
description: Rest area at Repsol station. Indicated its use as a parking lot for caravans. Toilets and sinks available, picnic tables as well. We slept there, feeling safe next to the gas station and 24 hour cafeteria. NOTICE: The maximum stay on Portuguese motorways is 12 hours. By sleeping in the area, we exceeded this limit and had to pay for the journey from Lisbon to the border. It's not the domain's fault, and therefore for me 5*

There is gymnastics equipment and a playground. No shaded parking but shaded seating. Garbage disposal available. The entire parking lot is illuminated, so it is very bright in the evenings.

description:
This idyllic and quiet place is surrounded by nature. Sheep, chickens, vegetable garden and a breathtaking view of the clear starry sky.

Access is via gravel roads.

One night against donation. Longer stays with the opportunity to help out in the vegetable garden, with the animals, with construction, etc. are possible by arrangement.

Love Alex

PS: Garden with fresh vegetables is available.

title_short: (2910-848) Setúbal - 52 Rua do Vale de Chaves

There are about 3 curbside parkingplaces on the edge of a park belonging to a school. Also a few larger other parking spots. Calm view, nice for the dog if you have one. Quiet on weekends. Might not be when school is on, although the school entrance is away from it and they have big parking lot. Nothing special but quiet place to get some work done, sleep and have breakfast.

name: Monte Zen Melides
title: (7570) Monte Zen Melides
description:
We value serenity and privacy, which is why we ask you to make pre-reservations before your arrival. Thus, we ensure that each one has a space reserved especially for him, allowing him to enjoy nature and his environment in peace.

Welcome to Monte Zen Melides - the perfect retreat for motorhomes seeking tranquility and connection with nature. Located just 2.5 km from the beautiful beach and lagoon of Melides, our space offers a relaxing and secure stay amid stunning natural scenery.

Imagine waking up to the sound of birdsong, surrounded by the pristine beauty of the natural landscape. Monte Zen Melides is a real sanctuary for nature lovers, where they can explore peaceful paths, admire the local fauna and flora, and relax under a starry sky.

In addition, the proximity to the beach and the lagoon of Melides offers a unique opportunity to indulge in the sea and the sun. Take a walk on the golden sands, take a dip in the crystal clear waters or just lay back and enjoy the warmth of the sun while listening to the gentle sound of the waves.

During your stay here, enjoy the exclusivity of our private space, designed to provide you with a unique and peaceful experience. We will always be ready to ensure that your stay is memorable and carefree.

At Monte Zen Melides, nature and the beach come together to provide unforgettable moments. Pre-book now and prepare for an invigorating experience immersed in the peace and harmony of this lush setting. We look forward to welcoming you soon! We do not have electricity service.

title: (2910) Setúbal - N10
description: Laundromat outside, in front of bricomarche. 4eur/8kg

title: (2910-296) Setúbal - 17B Rua José António da Conceição
title_short: (2910-296) Setúbal - 17B Rua José António da Conceição
description: Supermarket parking with sleeping pots. The supermarket opens at 8:30. Bugaderia service. Gasoli was. Hi has also a proper pizzeria. Quiet area for sleeping.

25 minutes from Lisbon and the sea.
Approaching National 4.

Rent pitches for camping car 3 or 4 max.
most: welcome and sympathy.

description: Location next to a Galp station, we saw a few motorhomes and parked without problem

name: Alentejo Litoral Caravan Park
title: (7500) Alentejo Litoral Caravan Park
description:
Private Pedro's nature service area
For motorhomes and similar vehicles.

we open at 10:00 am and close at 22 pm

Please note;
that at the entrance of the park, there's the rules on the wall, and you should call before getting in!!!

Our services;
1-Staying overnight from 19h until 11h.

2-Staying the 24h period.

3- Quad 4x4 renting, 

4- Bungalows to rent
(information on the spot)

Except from electricity,
all other services are free
(hot showers, barbecue, service area, natural Shadows) etc 

Note:

We do not have toilets (yet) you should have your own!!
otherwise you will not get in!
the space is a service area not a camping park!!

We have an area with farm animals which is good for our children.
and every morning the animals come outside and meet everybody.

come and visit us welcome

title: (2910-112) Setúbal - 10 Rua Bombeiros de Setúbal
description: Sand court, which is relatively uneven, but very large, so it is also suitable for large vehicles. Shopping center with many shops within walking distance.

title: (2910) Setúbal - 33 Rua Bombeiros de Setúbal
description: In front of the ALEGRO shopping center, there is transit of vehicles but it is a good point even if on a slight slope.

title: (2910-031) Setúbal - Unnamed Road
description: Park next to shopping center.

title: (2910-108) Setúbal - 12 Rua Doutor Evaristo Sousa Gago
title_short: (2910-108) Setúbal - 12 Rua Doutor Evaristo Sousa Gago
description:
Paved and delimited parking area where we already find several motorhomes and vans
Although the spaces are standard, they do not have a curb that marks the sidewalk and you can park in the back so as not to take up too much space. Our vehicle is a 6 meter van

title: (7570) Setúbal - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place near the lake, not crowded at all. The abandoned water pumping station to protect from the rain is near. Very tasty toast and grapes in the cafe near the old steam locomotive produced in Paris in 1891 :) new motorhome parking.

title: (7565) Ermidas do Sado -
description: Directly at the reservoir only for vans. With larger motorhomes it is possible but difficult. The road is very washed out with lots of potholes. There is only a turning point at the end of the path. If in doubt, walk down the path to see if you can get through.

title: (7570) Melides - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful sand track, well deflated tires at 1kg only in 4x4, magnificent spot to spend the night

title: (7500) Paio - 4 Rua do Ti Caniço
description: Regular parking but ever quite big car can fit there. At building below small grocery store. It possible to buy here gas bottles as well. When parking next to beach is closed for motorhomes, I've put my car here for couple of hours.

title: (7500-016) Paio - 124 Rua da Nortada
description: A small tap with drinking water, right beside the road.

title: (7570) Minas do Lousal -
description: Big flat Parking unused. Seems to be for visitors of the museum or for train station. 100 meter bumpy road shortly before.

title: (7565) Ermidas do Sado -
description: Alternative to the motorhome area if nature is needed. quiet corner next to a wood. lake 5 min walk. we stayed 2 nights with no problem.

title: (7570) Melides -
description: Pass a small sandy path at the level of the car park (quite passable by car/van…) to reach flat land surrounded by pine trees just behind the beach. The land is very calm with the sound of the waves when you wake up. Fairly clean, keep as is.

title: (7500-016) Paio - 23 Rua da Medronheirinha
description: Area with wooden tables and chairs to stop to eat. There is shade under the pines and a tap to catch water. It is right next to the Camping. There is also a trash bin.

title: (2900-362) Setúbal - 25 Rua Primeiro de Maio
description: Parking lot hidden from main street. It is noisy at early hours because of the nearby market.

title: (2900-412) Setúbal - 1 Rua João de Deus
description: Stop for the night. Free from 7:00 p.m. to 9:00 a.m., during the day you have to pay at the parking machine. We used it to spend the night because it gave us security to be right in front of the fire brigade. On the whole avenue nice restaurants. It's noisy at night, we stopped here to catch the ferry to Troia the next morning.

title: (7570) Minas do Lousal - 210 Rua 25 Abril
description:
The gate is open. A quiet, safe place in a small village. Choice of sun & shade spots. The facilities are in good order and clean. Every pitch has electricity. The drinking water does not have a connection for a garden hose. Behind the building is another water point, it might be easier there if you want to fill large amounts of water.

If you are a light sleeper, bring earplugs against the barking of the (stray) dogs. Occasionally they make a lot of noise, but not continuously.

The mining museum is nice to visit, even when it is closed you can walk through it and read the information boards.

You can also walk to the river. I saw a camper here, but I don't know if spending the night there is allowed.

I have not seen any police, GNR or any form of control in 3 days. But the village is so small that the locals keep an eye on it themselves, I think.

title: (2900-412) Setúbal - 281 Avenida Luísa Todi
description:
Online parking, in a very crowded area, and close to a police station.
Like the entire center of Setúbal, it is payable with a parking meter from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. the price is €3.20 every 4 hours. It is attached to the entire interesting area, and it has given me more security than other nearby car parks that appeared in the area.

title: (2900) Setúbal - 94 Avenida José Mourinho
description: We have parked here and spent the night without any problem.

title: (2900-209) Setúbal - 23 C Estrada Algodeia
description: Here's a great option for a quiet night's sleep in Setúbal, right by Parque Infantil da Algodeia. Great with a dog. The "Parque da Algodeia" right next to it and the "Parque do Bonfim" also right around the corner.

name: Santo André Lagoon
title: () Santo André Lagoon
description: Park of Campismo da Lagoa de Santo André. The nearest campsite to enjoy the lagoon and the sea... Good welcome, accessible and clean sanitary facilities, delimited and wide motorhome pitches, electricity included. A good technical stopover to get everything up to speed

title: (2900-597) Setúbal -
description: We spent one night in that parking lot, it is indicated that it is for professional fishermen, but another person with a van asked the police and they said that nothing was wrong. We were in total 3 Spanish vans and a whole day. There are quite a few people who go with their cars to see the sea at night and in the morning all kinds of people park up to go to the beach next door. We were a daily day and there are places to dine and others. I recommend it 100%.

title: (2900-464) Setúbal - 357 Avenida Luísa Todi
description: Level parking with enough space for a 6 meter van. Payment is made from Monday to Friday from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. and on Saturdays from 9 a.m. to 1 p.m. Overnight stays are allowed. It is close to the beach and different restaurants, both local food and pubs. Highly recommended to spend the night.

title: (2900-597) Setúbal - 5A Travessa Saboaria
description: Place where I spent the night and where there are usually more motorhomes and cars. Quiet and with good restaurants nearby.

title: (2900-052) Setúbal - 16A Avenida de Angola
description: Parking at the Lidl supermarket.

title: (2900-579) Setúbal - 22 N10-4
description: Two water taps possibly allowing the filling of containers. it is along the beach and therefore quite frequent but it can help out.

title: (2900) Setúbal - 22 Rua Hermínia Silva
description: Free public parking in setubal. For the day only

title: (2900-579) Setúbal - 122A Avenida José Mourinho
description: Online parking in front of the Rockalot (beach bar). It is next to the GNR headquarters so no problem. Beach 15 meters away and Setúbal center 15 minutes walk. We spent 2 nights and terrific

title: (2900-616) Setúbal - 20 Rua E do Bairro João Ferreira
title_short: (2900-616) Setúbal - 20 Rua E do Bairro João Ferreira
description: Unpaved square for parking by residents. The camper is tolerated. Dirty place (dog droppings) but quiet and close to the center. For shorter motorhomes only.

address.street: 20 Rua E do Bairro João Ferreira

title: (2900-300) Setúbal - Estr. do Castelo de São Filipe
title_short: (2900-300) Setúbal - Estr. do Castelo de São Filipe
description: Place to park right before the castle, up to 8m of length should not be a problem

address.street: Estr. do Castelo de São Filipe

title: (2900) Setúbal - Estrada do Castelo de São Filipe
title_short: (2900) Setúbal - Estrada do Castelo de São Filipe
description: Parking of Sao Filipe Castle. many visitors during the day. very nice visit of the castle possible and free but with superb view on setubal.

address.street: Estrada do Castelo de São Filipe

title: (7900-360) Odivelas - 5 N2
description: Just a place to spend the night of you need a free spot around here. It's next to a hotel, it's safe and not alot of noise.

title: (7900) Odivelas - N257
description: Peaceful place with an unobstructed view of the wild lake. In this place, you feel like you're alone in the world

title: (2900-322) Setúbal - 226 Rua Batalha do Viso
description: We travel in a minivan camper car, so we always look for places a little far from the center. This place is in a residential area, only neighbors walked with dogs, very nice! We came in the middle of August and there weren't many people, yes, it is in front of some schools, maybe in other months there would be more people.

title: (2950) Palmela - 19 Alexandre Herculano
description: They sell LPG but do not have to borrow adapters.

title: (2900) Setúbal - Unnamed Road
description:
Parking next to the Setubal campsite; good access for all types of housing vehicles; unlevel area.

In front of a small beach.
Next to Restaurant without dinners.
Great for Dogs.


During the day it is used for locals to use their boats, so in the morning 4x4s with trailers begin to arrive, and other people so that the taxi boat can bring them closer to their boats.

It is ideal to arrive around 7:30 p.m. and spend the night.

Around 3 seats.
When we arrived, at the end of August, there was only one AC and one Camper.


PLEASE DON'T LITTER THE PLACE


"Courage and Freedom"

title: (2900) Setúbal - N10-4
description: Parking for 5 motorhomes, we spend the night together with 5 more motorhomes as the campsite is full. Some noise on the road but good views.

name: EcoParque do Outão
title: (2900) EcoParque do Outão
description:
Nice campsite for mobile homes, caravans and tents. Hot showers and some new sanitary facilities in neat and clean condition. Supply and disposal are possible. You stand in a bay overlooking Setubal and the sea. The price includes showers, toilets, waste water and water tanks. Small bungalows are also available. Attention only busy from 9am to 7pm (arrival possible).
Note: they do not take pitch reservations.

title: (2900-182) Setúbal Municipality - Forte Velho do Outão
title_short: (2900-182) Setúbal Municipality - Forte Velho do Outão
description: Abandoned fort, former defense site of the bay of Setubal. exceptional site overlooking the bay. Considering the lack of spots in the region, this place seemed perfect to spend the night but we quickly became disillusioned, a lot of comings and goings, gatherings of noisy young people ... and this despite the fact that we were on weekdays. At 2 am still impossible to sleep. We do not recommend going to land in the back of the site near the cannons if you want to be quiet. The parking lot at the entrance to the site is perhaps less busy. Short site to see but not relaxing.

name: Quinta do Sol
title: (2950) Quinta do Sol
description:
Quinta do Sol
Family rural property, with the possibility of staying overnight.
contact me before arrival

title: (2900-182) Setúbal - R. Orlando Curto
description: Place along a road, but wake up with the camper door towards the water with a fantastic view over the sea. 5 minutes walk to the beach with amenities. Setubal has a nice old town and a beautiful fort sao fillipe.

title: (7050-164) Montemor-o-Novo - 5 Rua da Condessa de Valenca
title_short: (7050-164) Montemor-o-Novo - 5 Rua da Condessa de Valenca
description: Short places (5,5metter) down the ramparts

title: (7050-177) Montemor-o-Novo - 14 Rua da Matriz Velha
description: Below the castle car park, earthen esplanade. slight slope.

title: (7900) Odivelas - Unnamed Road
description: Square in the countryside next to the dam. Near a charming Alentejo village. Nice view, very quiet place. Swimming possible. No convenience. Be careful not to drive into the sand. Bar Snack 800 meters to have a drink!

title: (2950) Palmela -
description: Quiet and easy to access place next to a picnic area with picnic tables and barbecue facilities

title: (7050-165) Montemor-o-Novo - 1 Lg. do Terrado
description: Laundry box with 18kg and 8kg washing machines and a large dryer in the Lidl car park.

title: (7050-164) Montemor-o-Novo - 30 Rua da Condessa de Valenca
title_short: (7050-164) Montemor-o-Novo - 30 Rua da Condessa de Valenca
description: WC near the San Tiago Church. Very clean.

title: (2950-011) Palmela - 54 Avenida Antoine Velge
description: Clean laundry, parking directly in front (possibly a bit difficult with a larger camper). Washing machines: 12, 16, 20 kg

title: (7050-225) Montemor-o-Novo - 9A Rua de São Tiago do Castelo
title_short: (7050-225) Montemor-o-Novo - 9A Rua de São Tiago do Castelo
description: Small peaceful location high up in the village, we spent a very quiet night, no passage. Very nice on the edge of the rampart with public toilets nearby. Toilets closed at night unfortunately (I don't have the timetables) but open the next day at 9:30 am, very clean.

address.street: 9A Rua de São Tiago do Castelo

title: (7540) Santa Cruz - 121 R. Menino do Freixo
title_short: (7540) Santa Cruz - 121 R. Menino do Freixo
description: Nice spot for backpacker, earth and gravel on the ground, not flat but satellite and 4g works. No service only 1 trash can and water from the washer basins for washing clothes.

title: (2900) Setúbal - N379-1
description: Small car park, rather flat, on the edge of the very beautiful N379-1. Very quiet road at night, therefore very quiet. Enough places for 2/3 Motorhomes + 2 places in the shade for VL or van. View over the bay of Troia / Setubal. No service.

title: (7050-165) Montemor-o-Novo - 53 Rua Curvo Semedo
description:
Speed Queen Self Service Laundromat.

If you are lucky, you can park in front of the door or at the Lidl next door.

title: (7500) Santiago do Cacém - 13 A26-1
description: Small car park at the start of the walk to visit the nature reserve das lagoas de santo andre e da sancha. Lots of explanatory panels along the walk it's very nice to do and very pleasant to walk in peace (even the children are silent to see the animals)

title: (7050-225) Montemor-o-Novo - 50 Rua Dom Vasco
description: Free parking in the center of this typical village, right next to the archaeological museum! The castle is not far away. Possibility of spending the night. We stopped for lunch.

name: Quinta das Kopas
title: (2955-252) Quinta das Kopas
description:
Check-in 12:00-21:00     |    Check-out 7h30-14h00

Quinta das Kopas is a little private rural farm where you can stay in the middle of the fruit trees.
Excellent location to visit Lisbon as it is only 30 minutes from Lisbon by train. The station is just 2 km away and we will drop you off and pick you up for free.
We have facilities such as hot water showers, toilets, place to wash dishes, barbecue, washing machine, washing line, a gym and a living room (with tv and board games), as well as places to dump and refill water (only for those who sleep on the farm).
There is also a small warm salt water pool, about 33º (different hours for adults and children) and a jacuzzi if you really want to get completely relaxed.
You can also rest, read, listen to music or even sleep on the hammocks or in other seating and lying areas of our garden. But if your idea is to be a little more active, you can play our outdoor games.
Sociable pets are welcome (free of charge) but must always be on a leash and cannot be in the common interior spaces (vaccination card required).
We also have a mobile home for travelers without a motorhome or friends of our guests.
Quinta das Kopas was designed to welcome friends from different countries who want to take a break from their journey and enjoy Portuguese nature and hospitality.
Please come with google maps to make it easier to reach the gate. It is on a dead-end street and is the first gate on the left with the nameplate on the wall. (Attention: waze does not bring you to the gate).
Please check prices.

Reservation is not mandatory, but if you really want to secure your place, it would be better to get in touch with us because our capacity is per person.

title: (2900) Setúbal - R. Orlando Curto
description: Beach showers, toilets and taps available free of charge. We went there in the early morning there was no one there!

title: (7050-252) Montemor-o-Novo - Via Rua do Matadouro
description: Day and night parking located in the praça de toiros. Perfect for visiting the city and the castle. No services

title: (7050-214) Montemor-o-Novo - 4 Rua do Calvário
description: WC in the city public garden. Very clean

title: (7050-097) Montemor-o-Novo - 17B Avenida Gago Coutinho
description: Repsol petrol station, water column available, which is easily accessible.

title: (7050) Montemor-o-Novo - 2 Travessa do Calvário
description: Tap with free water!!!

title: (7540) - N121
description:
Motorhome/caravan overnight parking, private, fenced with controlled access (entry and exit) by video images for user safety. Provides non-drinking water. Price to be charged per vehicle only regardless of the number of occupants or pets. Time limit for entry to the park 11pm for total rest for those who are there.
Park in a natural environment where all the electrical energy used is of solar origin limiting its use. we have only one SOS point made available for life support purposes

title: (2950) Palmela - 2 Avenida dos Cavaleiros de Santiago e Espada
title_short: (2950) Palmela - 2 Avenida dos Cavaleiros de Santiago e Espada
description: Flat parking with magnificent views. A lot of passage. Trash, no service. Going through the village attention; narrow streets; and not more than 3,5 t

address.street: 2 Avenida dos Cavaleiros de Santiago e Espada

title: (7050-160) Montemor-o-Novo -
description: Parking lot, free

title: (2950) Palmela - Rua Custódio Simões
description: Location in a pine forest with views of Setubal

title: () Odivelas - Unnamed Road
description: At the edge of the dam, site with bar snack, beach, children playground, outdoor barbecues, picnic, beach NET tables free volleyball, wc and showers.  Possibility to spend the night in the driveway above the site, but not inside the site because camping 1 km, peaceful place with amenities.

title: (2950-313) Palmela - 3 Avenida Visconde Tojal
description: Natural gas is for sale. They can borrow 2 adapters but the two did not match.

title: (2950-218) Palmela - 1 Largo dos Loureiros
description: Public parking next to public gym and 5min to public swimming pool with hot showers . High up in historical part of the village, very quiet at night with great walks around the site… only thing is rubbish collection truck comes at 7am otherwise great spot,good restaurants and coffee shops around .

title: (7050-167) Montemor-o-Novo - 74 Avenida Gago Coutinho
description: Washing machines directly behind the BP gas station

title: (7050-217) Montemor-o-Novo - 41 Rua da Janelinha
description: Intermaché parking we spend the night without problem. Diesel cheaper than any other trip. There is water in the station.

title: (7050) Montemor-o-Novo - Rua Manuel da Fonseca
description: Parking of the exhibition grounds

title: (7920) Alvito - Unnamed Road
description: Located on the at the ‘barragem de olivedas’ lake, between the picnic spot (with a very nice bar/restaurant) and the camping. The picnic spot (5 min walk) has toilets & showers and drinking water. Picnic spot itself gets checked by GNR quite regularly but camping a bit further out/behind it, leaves you a beautiful spot next to the lake with services close by.

title: (2950) Palmela - 2 Rua Manuel Verissimo da Silva
title_short: (2950) Palmela - 2 Rua Manuel Verissimo da Silva
description: Easy parking. Especially good for avoiding at the weekend when the parking lot of the Castelo de Palmela gets a little louder again. You're on the ground floor, it's quiet at night and you don't bother anyone.

title: (7900-252) Figueira dos Cavaleiros - 23 N259
description: A small parking area with a playground for kids. 3G or 4G available ?

name: Camping Markadia
title: (7920-999) Camping Markadia
description: Campsite Markádia. The campsite is open all year round. It is located at the Odivelas reservoir, on a 25 acre peninsula. Best campsite we have been, huge lake to do activities: windsurf, Paddel, canoe, tenis, absolut Nature. Perfect layover between Algarve and Lisbon, it's a piece of heaven on earth. Everything very clean, Washrooms... 2 Restaurants with view to the lake. Pool, tenis, kids area.

title: (7565) Ermidas do Sado - IC1
description: Drinking water from two wells, picnic area available, approx. 10 parking spaces.

title: (7565) Ermidas do Sado - 7565 N121
description:
Self-service laundry.
Parking in front of the vending machines.

title: () Santiago do Cacém - Avenida de Sines
title_short: () Santiago do Cacém - Avenida de Sines
description:
Intermarché Santo André

Good place to stay. Very quiet. Everything is free (WasteWater,Black Water, Waste Container, Fresh Water, WC (no Showers)).
Also have the Supermarket and the night guard !!!
You can also wash and dry your clothes (need to pay for that).

title: (7500) Santiago do Cacém - Unnamed Road
description: Parking on the beach Without services. Beginning of Poço da Barbarroxa trail, through the forest, the dune and the beach. For the day only
